ing.item: 10 oz pkg frozen chopped spinach; thawed and drained

directions.step:
In large nonstick skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat 10-12 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring occasionally. Pour off drippings. Season beef with chili powder, cumin and 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Stir in spinach and salsa; heat through. Remove from heat; stir in cheese. Spoon 1/2 cup beef mixture in center of each tortilla. Fold bottom edge up over filling; fold sides to center, overlapping edges. Posted to EAT-L Digest 29 Jul 96
